div.h4: The administration and staff of Paducah ISD are committed to providing an environment that allows full development of each student’s potential abilities which will ensure that student’s position in an institution of higher learning and/or as a productive citizen of the community.

p.img:
​
Bullying is not tolerated by Paducah ISD.

span.strong: Any parent or student who believes that a student has experienced bullying or has engaged in bullying is encouraged to report the incident immediately to the campus Principal.

strong.a: Click for the anonymous bullying form.

div.p: Please refer any problems or suggestions to Shannon Waitman, Paducah ISD Webmaster
